get.summary: Get the videos the session user has rights on

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Pass some filters to narrow down the list of videos

get.summary: Get Details for video with ID

delete.description: Move video to trashbin or delete it from Stud.IP and Opencast completely if already trashed! **This operation will completely remove a video if it is in the trashbin. It will remove the entry from Stud.IP and retract and delete the event completely in Opencast, so use with care!**'

put.description: If the video is still in the trashbin, this operation will restore it

post.description: Add a video to Stud.IP (used after upload an event to Opencast)

parameters.name: episode_id
parameters.description: UUID of the event in Opencast

put.description: Sends a technical feedback for the video with the passed token to the configured OPENCAST_SUPPORT_EMAIL
Set playlist links for the video with the passed token, clearing out all not passed playlist links.

requestBody.description: List of courses to link to

get.summary: Set playlist link
get.description: Set playlist links for the video with the passed token, clearing out all not passed playlist links.

put.description: Set playlist links for the video with the passed token, clearing out all not passed playlist links.

requestBody.description: List of courses to link to

put.description: This allows worldwide sharing (or revoking of it) for the video with the passed token. This will result in adding `ROLE_ANONYMOUS` for the event in Opencast

get.summary: Get all videos where the session user has onwer perms on
get.description: This is used to list all videos which can be included in the courseware by the session user. The difference to the `/videos` route is, that only videos the user has owner perms on are listed (and not simply read perms)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Pass some filters to narrow down the list of videos

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

put.summary: Update the playlist with the passed id

put.description: Set order of videos for the playlist with the passed token, giving each video a defined position

get.summary: returns a list of all courses the current user has tutor perms for or higher
Returns videos directly associated to this course
Returns the config settings for this course, like series and configured workflow
Returns playlists for this course. Videos without explicit playlist in this course are mapped to a virtual playlist which can be accessed via the standard playlist routes
Get list of scheduled events for this course

parameters.name: semester_filter
parameters.description: ID of the selected semester filter or 'all'

put.description: Toggle if students can upload videos to this course. This route respects the setting `OPENCAST_TUTOR_EPISODE_PERM`, which toggles if tutor have the same rights in a course as lecturers

parameters.name: upload
parameters.description: Shall upload for students be allowed in this course?

put.summary: Configure default visibility for new videos
put.description: Configure the default visibility for videos in this course. Videos with modified visiblity are unaffected.

requestBody.description: Visibility setting. `default` means using the global setting
